data.name: Re:Award -More Corridor 1-
data.detailed_description:
Short third person game.
The game is a free add-on to the base game.

How to play
You can select this game when you push "PLAY" on Steam app.

About game
Simulator walking in corridor.
Let's destroy the barrels blocking the corridor with a hammer!

Success condition
The player finds the key to the goal door and reaches the goal.

Method of operation
W, A, S, D: Move
Spacebar: jump
E: Draw the hammer
Left click: Attack
ESC: Pause screen

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7,8,10(64bit)
  • Processor: Intel Quad-Core or AMD Octa-Core
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GT or AMD Radeon HD
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 255 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7,8,10(64bit)
  • Processor: Intel Quad-Core or AMD Octa-Core
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GT or AMD Radeon HD
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 255 MB available space
